verses.name: Matthew 3:6
verses.text: And were baptized of him in Jordan, confessing their sins.

verses.name: Matthew 3:7
verses.text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism, he said unto them, O generation of vipers, who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come?

verses.name: Matthew 3:8
verses.text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance:

verses.name: Matthew 3:9
verses.text: And think not to say within yourselves, We have Abraham to our father: for I say unto you, that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham.
